body.p: The following article contains an error: ‘A GLP-1 receptor agonist liraglutide inhibits endothelial cell dysfunction and vascular adhesion molecule expression in an ApoE-/- mouse model’ by Tracey Gaspari, HongBin Liu, Iresha Welungoda, Yunshan Hu, Robert E Widdop, Lotte B Knudsen, Richard W Simpson and Anthony E Dear, published in Diabetes & Vascular Disease Research 2011; 8(2): 117–124, DOI: 10.1177/1479164111404257.
Page 121, left column, the third paragraph, beginning ‘No significant change…’, should be replaced with the following text:
A small but significant decrease in body weight and trend to reduction in systolic blood pressure was noted in the liraglutide treated groups (data shown below).

caption.p: Data in relation to body weight and systolic blood pressure from the four-week in vivo study.
*p<0.05, liraglutide group before treatment commenced vs liraglutide group after treatment commenced.

body.p: The authors apologize for this error.
